roleset.name: (try to) cause motion, cause motion

TOWING-N NOTES: Based on Temprel sentences. Comparison to tow. Framed by Katie. (from towing.01-n)

role.descr: DIR, GOL or attribute of arg1

example.name: tow-v: boat
example.text: Out in the harbor, preparations are being made to attach cables to the tanker so that it-3 can be floated and towed *-3 out to sea.

example.name: towing-n: args 0, 1, and 2
example.text: his towing of the car to the repair shop

example.name: towing-n: arg 3
example.text: the 100 mile towing included in the AAA Plus membership saved my butt many times over the years.

example.name: tow-n
example.text: The pickup must be within city limits and includes up to a 10-mile tow.
